name: Steamboy's Adventure
description:
/!\ IT'S BETTER TO USE CHROME /!\

Arrow keys to move around

space to jump

Up arrow to us the jetpack

Return to pause

if the character doesn't move at first pause the game then un-pause it

This is our first game in unity made for our IT school.

We had 4 days to make a game from scratch without a theme, we decided on a puzle platformer in a steam punk era.

Made by:

Martin Gouviaux

Baptiste Martin

Gaspard Martin

Marco Pyre
